title: Guide für das Mordekaiser Rework

embed.title: ULTIMATE S9 Mordekaiser Guide | High Pace Mordekaiser Guide
embed.description: It's the fourth video of my champion guides series, and first one i entirely created based on the PBE state of the shown champion: Mordekaiser. Hence no guarantee for completeness nor certainty everything shown will stay as is for long. Riot tends to change up, add and remove mechanics and interactions, especially from new and reworked champions.

body: Video mit ein paar Combos und Tricks für den neuen Mordekaiser.
